channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 14 Best Bed Frames (2025), Tested in Our Homes
item.description: Looking for the best bed frame? Our top pick is the Classic Bed from Thuma. Explore our other favorites, which include options for all budgets and tas...

item.title: Google’s SIMA 2 agent uses Gemini to reason and act in virtual world
item.description: “SIMA 2 is a more general agent. It can complete complex tasks in previously unseen environments. And it's a self improving agent... which is a step t...

item.title: Apple’s new App Review Guidelines clamp down on apps sharing personal data with ‘third-party AI’
item.description: Apple updates its App Store rules to restrict apps from sharing personal data with third-party AI without disclosure and explicit permission.

item.title: Newsletter platform beehiiv adds AI website building, creator tools in major expansion
item.description: Newsletter platform beehiiv announced a massive expansion to its platform on Thursday, including offering real-time analytics and AI website creation.

item.title: British Churches Are Putting Their Faith in Heat Pumps
item.description: Ancient buildings and old bones aren’t getting in the way of the transition.

item.title: Build Mode starts at the beginning: How Forethought AI found product-market fit

item.title: Sam Atlman-backed Exowatt wants to power AI data centers with billions of hot rocks
item.description: The solar-thermal startup wants to deliver electricity for as little as one cent per kWh. But first it has to scale production to 1 million units per ...

item.title: LinkedIn adds AI-powered search to help users find people
item.description: LinkedIn's AI-powered people search is rolling out to premium users in the U.S.

item.title: Blue Origin sticks first New Glenn rocket landing and launches NASA spacecraft
item.description: It's an impressive accomplishment for the new mega-rocket launch system, and paves the way for the company to start re-using the boosters in commercia...

item.title: Uber quietly pilots in-app video recording for drivers in India
item.description: Uber's in-app video recording pilot is currently live in 10 cities across India. The tool is meant to deter misconduct in a market where most drivers ...
